price: Wala asikuzuilieni Shet'ani. Hakika yeye ni adui yenu wa dhaahiri.
arabic: وَلَا يَصُدَّنَّكُمُ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَكُمۡ عَدُوّٞ مُّبِينٞ
footnotes: Wala asikuzuilieni Shetani kuifuata Njia Iliyo Nyooka. Hakika huyo ni adui aliye dhaahiri uadui wake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: walā yaṣuddannakumu al-shayṭānu innahu lakum ʿaduwwun mubīnun
